Translations.Text: Ja vi am this fleeting life
While disregarding Hereafter
Kelk vizagx sur ke tag est felicx
rigard their Lord
Ali vizagx est ke tag miserable
Expecting des mav
Ja when (anim) reaches gorgx
Gxi ord Let
Li kon gxi est end
Each krur mensog motionless ali krur
Al your Lord sur tag est des summoning
Por li observ nek charity nor kontakt prayers (Salat)
Li disbelieved torn
Kun his famili li akt arrogantly
Vi ind this
Ja vi ind this
human est opini li ir nothing
Li ne gut est ejected semen
Tiam Li kre embryo gxi
Li far gxi vir female
Li est tiam unable revive dead
Gxi ne fakt est ke tie temp when human est nothing est est al menci
Ni kre human liquid mixture el 2 parents en ord test him! Tiel ni far him hearer seer
Ni montr him 2 paths tiam li est either appreciative unappreciative
Ni prepar disbelievers cxen shackles blazing Infer
As por virtuous ili trink tas spic nektar
